ext.config.title: Frida
ext.config.runtime:
Runtime used by frida.

`v8` runtime offers cutting edge JavaScript but `duk` is lighter.
ext.config.addr:
List of remote devices to use.

Devices put here will be used only if _remote_ is enabled.

Usage: `['192.168.1.1:1234', '10.10.10.100:1337', ...]`
ext.config.log:
Log frida repl output.

Logs will be saved in `[script_name_]device_[application|pid]_timestamp.log`
ext.config.save:
Save script and output.

Will make a copy of the script run and the frida's output in a separate directory (`save/timestamp/{script_name.js,output.log}`)
ext.config.dir:
Output directory.

Directory where log and saved files are put.
